Title: The Reluctant Hero
Plot: Joey's ""semi-date"" with Jack prompts a resentful Dawson to join Jen at a bash where he saves her from doing some things she'll regret. Pacey proves his worth when Andie's mom has a psychotic break during their study session. Mitch cannot understand Dawson's views on their divorce.
GuestStars: Caroline Kava, Todd Sheeler, Rasool J'Han
